publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5776 Mr Jamie McGrigor: The Inshore Fishing (Prohibited Methods of Fishing) (Firth of Lorn) (No. 2) Order 2007—That the Environment and Rural Development Committee recommends that nothing further be done under the Inshore Fishing (Prohibited Methods of Fishing) (Firth of Lorn) (No. 2) Order 2007 (SSI 2007/240).

S2M-5776 Mr Jamie McGrigor: The Inshore Fishing (Prohibited Methods of Fishing) (Firth of Lorn) (No. 2) Order 2007—That the Environment and Rural Development Committee recommends that nothing further be done under the Inshore Fishing (Prohibited Methods of Fishing) (Firth of Lorn) (No. 2) Order 2007 (SSI 2007/240).
